aRMT_phq8_Export_KeySchema.name: MeasurementKey
aRMT_phq8_Export_KeySchema.doc: Measurement key in the RADAR-CNS project

aRMT_phq8_Export_ValueSchema.name: Questionnaire
aRMT_phq8_Export_ValueSchema.doc: General schema for questionnaire. Check the specification folder to see how the questionnaire has been defined. For each QuestionnaireType there is a JSON file reporting the questions set and possible answers if available

fields.name: version
fields.doc: Questionnaire version useful to support possible update

fields.name: startTime
fields.doc: timestamp in UTC (s) when the question is shown

fields.name: endTime
fields.doc: timestamp in UTC (s)  when the question is answered

fields.name: startTime
fields.doc: timestamp in UTC (s) when the questionnaire is submitted to the subject

fields.name: endTime
fields.doc: timestamp in UTC (s) when the questionnaire is sent out to the platform
